author: Roger Leblanc

changelog.release_notes: - Fixed a bug that would return weather temperature in Kelvin instead of Celsius/Fahrenheit for OpenWeatherMap

- Added option to disable animations
- Added option to disable vibration on bluetooth disconnection
- Phone percentage is now saved on exit and reloaded on startup to avoid showing '0%' on startup

Thanks to Omi for suggestions

- Now respect Quiet Time (doesn't vibrate)
- Small code refactoring

- Added new option in configuration page to change notification text color. This will also color icons, which takes more battery. Leave to black to save battery. 

- Removed irrelevant city error message.

- GPS will now be used if you don't enter a city in watchface configuration page
- Fixed a memory issue that would make icons disappear after a certain amount of time
- N2W is now open source : https://github.com/RodgerLeblanc/N2W

(Thanks to IDLE0095 for bug report and suggestions)
Added new options for battery level in configuration page
Added Google Allo and Dashboard for Pebble support.
Added new option in configuration page for battery level : Do not show
Fixed Google Drive icon
Added support for multiple running apps and stock Music app
Added SZ.de and DB Navigator support
Added Sony Ericsson SMS, Threema, Le Monde and EuroSport support
- Fixed a layout hug for Pebble Time Round

- Fixed certain text not being centered correctly
- Code improvement

- Following multiple comments, battery level is now back on one line. You can choose between three different styles in configuration page.
- Added Google Drive and Google Inbox support.
- Code optimization

- Added support for Pebble Time 2
- Added option in configuration page for showing battery levels as icons (Thanks to Oskar for suggestion)

- Bigger font for battery percentage, also needed to change battery percentage placement on rectangular screen to allow bigger font. (Thanks to Omi for suggestion)
- Weather is now cached and reused for 30 minutes. (Thanks to Omi for suggestion)
- New weather provider selection in configuration page : Yahoo or OpenWeatherMap. Choose the one you prefer, Yahoo is default. (Thanks to Kristofer for suggestion)
- Improved weather error check and retries

- Weather data is now reused if not older than 30 minutes
- App start checkup to see if weather is getting retrieved or not
- Pebble Time now supports 7 icons instead of 4 (can't remember if it was in this release or previous one)
- Added tethering icon

- Pebble Time Round can now show 7 icons instead of 4.
- Added degree symbol to temperature (will not show for temperature over 100 to save on space)

description:
Get your notification icons on your Pebble and stop glancing at your phone every 2 minutes to see if you have unread notifications.

Supports all major social apps and many popular apps. Must be used with the connected Android app Notif2Watch.

Main features:
- Displays Android battery
- Displays Pebble battery
- Battery level shown as text,  icon or circle
- Weather (Yahoo or OpenWeatherMap)
- Vibrate on new notification
- Color configuration

Supports all Pebble : Pebble Classic, Pebble Steel, Pebble Time, Pebble Time Steel, Pebble Time Round, Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2.

latest_release.release_notes: - Fixed a bug that would return weather temperature in Kelvin instead of Celsius/Fahrenheit for OpenWeatherMap

title: N2W
